author: sta.si
title: Ground News - STA: The rain stopped the show from happening in Miami.
text: tennis matches at the Miami tournament, where an ATP tournament with a prize fund of 9,760,316 euros and a WTA tournament with 8,238,174 euros are taking place. Meanwhile, the weather forecast is bad and there is a possibility that they will not play today, reports the French news agency AFP. 0 Articles 0 Articles [Le Temps 3 hours agoRead Full Article] The Miami Open, showcase of the “Tennis State” that is Florida Urban courts, key time and tax advantages attract many athletes in Sunshine State. Until March 31st, the "fifth Grand Chelem Tournament" measures local passion for small yellow ball Darwin Blanch is making his professional debut at the Miami Open centre, in the 60,000-seat stadium of the American Dolphins football team on the outskirts of the city. He is only 16 years old – almost a record-breaking age for a Masters 1000, the most important cate… [sta.si 1 hour agoRead Full Article] Rain has prevented the start of today's tennis matches at the Miami tournament, where an ATP tournament with a prize fund of 9,760,316 euros and a WTA tournament with 8,238,174 euros are taking place. Meanwhile, the weather forecast is bad and there is a possibility that they will not play today, reports the French news agency AFP.
